ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Adds support for R startup configuration via '.Renviron.d' and '.Rprofile.d' directories in addition to '.Renviron' and '.Rprofile' files.  This makes it possible to keep private / secret environment variables separate from other environment variables.  It also makes it easier to share specific startup settings by simply copying a file to a directory.

Adds support for R startup configuration via '.Renviron.d' and '.Rprofile.d' directories in addition to '.Renviron' and '.Rprofile' files.  This makes it possible to keep private / secret environment variables separate from other environment variables.  It also makes it easier to share specific startup settings by simply copying a file to a directory.

name: r-startup
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.23.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-startup
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/startup_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/startup/startup_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 865f7e87bcce05e908b538be296a2c5b9901a07e5af3ca91ec89543281b0ffec

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('startup')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('startup')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://henrikbengtsson.github.io/startup/, https://github.com/HenrikBengtsson/startup
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  summary: Adds support for R startup configuration via '.Renviron.d' and '.Rprofile.d' directories in addition to '.Renviron' and '.Rprofile' files.  This makes it possible to keep private / secret environment variables separate from other environment variables.  It also makes it easier to share specific startup settings
    by simply copying a file to a directory.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-2.1

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dipterix
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: startup
# Version: 0.19.0
# Title: Friendly R Startup Configuration
# Depends: R (>= 2.14.0)
# Suggests: commonmark, tools, tcltk
# VignetteBuilder: startup
# Authors@R: c(person("Henrik", "Bengtsson", role=c("aut", "cre", "cph"), email = "henrikb@braju.com"))

This makes it possible to keep private / secret environment variables separate from other environment variables.  It also makes it easier to share specific startup settings by simply copying a file to a directory.
